actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide that construction licenses under the Act shall be subject to State disapproval during a 90-day period following the issuance thereof.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to stipulate that licenses for construction or modification of nuclear materials production or utilization facilities shall be subject to State disapproval for a 90-day period following notification of the affected State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide that construction licenses under the Act shall be subject to State disapproval during a 90-day period following the issuance thereof.
